entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
